whisper_demo.results: we met in the springtime when blossoms unfold the pastures were green and the letters were gold our love was in flower as summer grew long her love lacked the leaves now help withered and gone the roses have faded their sprawlsted my door the birds in the morning dont sing anymore the grass in the valley is starting to die and out in the darkness the whipper will cry alone and forsaken by feeding by man oh lord if you hear me please hold in my hand oh please understand where has she gone to or where can she be she may have forsaken some mother like me she promised to honor to love and obey each vow was a plaything that she threw away the darkness is falling the sky has turned grey the hound in the distance is starting to bathe i wonder i wonder what shes thinking of forsaken for gotten without in love alone and forsaken by feeding by man oh lord if you hear me please hold in my hand oh please understand
whisper_demo.lyrics: we met in the springtime when blossoms unfold the pastures were green and the meadows were gold our love was in flower as summer grew on her love like the leaves now has withered and gone the roses have faded theres frost at my door the birds in the morning dont sing anymore the grass in the valley is starting to die and out in the darkness the whippoorwills cry alone and forsaken by fate and by man oh lord if you hear me please hold my hand oh please understand you might also like oh where has she gone to oh where can she be she may have forsaken some other like me she promised to honor to love and obey each vow was a plaything that she threw away the darkness is falling the sky has turned gray a hound in the distance is starting to bay i wonder i wonder what shes thinking of forsaken forgotten without any love alone and forsaken by fate and by man oh lord if you hear me please hold my hand oh please understand
